{{Description|Only by a stroke of luck may one chance upon this paradise enveloped by clouds and mist. Though it appears serene from the outside, there is peril to be found within.}}
'''Domain of Forsaken Ruins''' is a [[One-Time Domain]]. It contains one level, '''Lucky Encounter in the Clouds''', which awards one [[Precious Chest]] upon completion.
